page.title: 16Media in Wootton Bassett
page.content: The{video library}has been renting video tapes for two and a half years. All tapes in the video library cost Â£45 to Â£50.The{bookshop}has been in business 7 yrs.The owner is advised by the professionals which books are the most popular.The most expensive book in the shop is Â£20.The owner says that books will live for ever.Our resident{reporter}has been a reporter for 25 years.She writes a page for a local paper called the Gazette.She is also the editor of the local community magazine.This takes 18 hrs. keying in and 6 hrs. sorting on a local word processor before being sent to the printers.9{newsagents}in the town sell approx. 23,785 newspapers and 3,218 magazines weekly.Up to 27 different newspapers and 920 magazines are available.Of the nine shops,5 sell popular books and 2 sell video tapes.
